text: Bedu'inadera yara pechane raye giyechila tadera bala -- ''sighra'i tomadera daka de'oya habe eka prabala parakranta jatira birud'dhe, tomara tadera sange yud'dha karabe yataksana na tara aâ€Œtmasamarpana kare, takhana yadi tomara ajnapalana kara, tahale allah tomadera pradana karabena eka uttama pratidana. Kintu yadi tomara phire ya'o yemana agera dine tomara phire yete, tahale tini tomadera sayesta karabena marmantuda sastite.
